## List of abbreviations 
```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)

abbrev = c("AR"="Autoregressive", "ESM"="Experience Sampling Method", "MLAR(1)"="Multilevel first-order autoregressive", "NA" = "Negative affect", "PA" = "Positive affect", "SD" = "Standard deviation", "N" = "Number of participants", "T.obs" = "Number of observations (timepoints) per participant")

abbreviation_list = data.frame(abbrev) 
colnames(abbreviation_list) = " "

kable(abbreviation_list, 
      format = "latex", 
      booktabs = TRUE,  
      digits = 2,
      caption = "ANOVA results, simulation A. Outcome: Estimation bias")
```
